body.bibl: Uray, Géza. “Tibet’s Connections with Nestorianism and Manichaeism in the 8th–10th Centuries.” In Contributions on Tibetan Language, History and Culture: Proceedings of the Csoma De Körös Symposium Held at Velm-Vienna, Austria, 13-19 September 1981, edited by Ernst Steinkellner and Helmut Tauscher, 1:399–429.
